StnryAssetEnvrSrc.name: StnryAssetEnvrSrc
StnryAssetEnvrSrc.description: Represents assets that are stationary in nature, use energy that can be recorded, and are the source of greenhouse gas emissions.

AccountNameId.description: Name of the company, it's subsidiary, or it's business unit for which you are doing carbon accounting. This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

BusinessRegion.description: The business region where this stationary asset is located.

City.description: The city where this stationary asset is located.

Country.description: The country where this stationary asset is located.

CrbnEmssnScopeAllocId.description: The carbon emissions scope allocation record to override the default scope assignments for all the fuel types.

Description.description: The description of the stationary asset environmental source.

ElectricityEmssnFctrId.description: The electricity emissions factor set record that's used to calculate emissions associated with the electricity consumed by this stationary asset.

EnvironmentalRiskId.description: The risk that's associated with the stationary asset environmental source.

IsCompanyOwnedAsset.description: Indicates whether the asset is owned by your company (true) or not (false). Asset ownership by the company impacts the scope allocation of associated emissions.

IsLeedCertified.description: Indicates whether the stationary asset is certified as a green building (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LeaseExpirationDate.description: The date when the lease of the stationary asset expires.

LeaseIdentifier.description: The unique external identifier for the lease of the stationary asset.

MktBsdElectriEmssnFctrId.description: The electricity emissions factor set record that's used to calculate market-based emissions associated with the electricity consumed by this stationary asset.

OccupiedFloorArea.description: The building floor area occupied by your organization. This value is used in associated carbon footprint or energy use records.

OccupiedFloorAreaUnit.description: The unit of measure for the occupied floor area.

OtherEmssnFctrId.description: The other emissions factor set record containing emissions factors for the consumption of other fuel types.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ParentEnvironmentalSourceId.description: The parent asset that stores the aggregated emissions data of all the related assets.

PostalCode.description: The postal code of this stationary asset.

PremiseIdentifier.description: The unique external identifier for the building.

RecordTypeId.description: The unique identifier of the record type.

RefrigerantEmssnFctrId.description: The refrigerant emissions factor record that's used to calculate emissions based on the refrigerant values.

RegionalBldgEnergyIntensityId.description: The building energy intensity record is automatically populated when the country is the United States, the postal code is valid, and the total building floor area is entered.

State.description: The state where this stationary asset is located.

StationaryAssetIdentifier.description: The unique external identifier for the stationary asset.

StationaryAssetType.description: The type of stationary asset. You can enter the selected asset type as the building asset type in the associated building energy intensity record.

StreetAddress.description: The street address where this stationary asset is located.

StreetAddress2.description: The second line of the street address where this stationary asset is located.

TotalFloorArea.description: The total building floor area of your organization. This value is used in associated carbon footprint or energy use records.

TotalFloorAreaUnit.description: The unit of measure for the total floor area.

WstDispoEmssnFctrSetId.description: The waste disposal emissions factors set that's associated with the stationary asset environmental source.
